text: Sheikh Ejaz Ahmad is a Pakistani politician and businessman who is the founder of Ejaz Group. He was the member of the Senate of Pakistan from 1985 to 1988. ==Ejaz Group== The group owns following businesses: * Ejaz Textile Mills * Ejaz Spinning Mills * Lake City Holdings ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Senate of Pakistan Category:Pakistani company founders Category:Pakistani industrialists Category:Chinioti people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sheikh Ejaz Ahmad
